CISS-VAE

API Reference

Classes

ciss_vae.classes.vae.CISSVAE(…)

ciss_vae.classes.cluster_dataset.ClusterDataset(…)

ciss_vae.training.autotune.SearchSpace(…)

Defines tunable and fixed hyperparameter ranges. Input for 'autotune' function. [] -> pick items from list. () -> tuple, creates a range (min, max, step). x -> use single value.

Training & Tuning

ciss_vae.training.autotune.autotune(…)

Optuna-based hyperparameter search for VAE model.

ciss_vae.utils.run_cissvae.run_cissvae(…)

End-to-end pipeline to train a Clustering-Informed Shared-Structure Variational Autoencoder (CISS-VAE).

Helpers & Plotting

ciss_vae.utils.run_cissvae.cluster_on_missing(…)

Given pandas dataframe with missing data, clusters on missingness pattern and returns cluster labels.

ciss_vae.utils.run_cissvae.cluster_on_missing_prop(…)

Cluster columns (biomarkers) using per-sample proportions of missingness.

ciss_vae.utils.helpers.get_imputed_df(…)

Given trained model and cluster dataset object, get imputed dataset.

ciss_vae.utils.helpers.plot_vae_architecture(…)

Plots a horizontal schematic of the VAE architecture, showing shared and cluster-specific layers.
